page.title: 02EDUCATION-LLANFECHAIN SCHOOL
page.content: Llanfechain school consists of 33 children two teachers, one cook and one caretaker.The school was opened by Mr Clement Davies in 1951. There was a special key made to open it but Mr Clement Davies Wanted a ordinary key. The key is gold plated and has got writing on which says Presented to the R.T. Hon Clement Davies K.C.M.P. on the opening of Llanfechain Primary school 1951. K.C.M.P. means Knight Commander and Member of Parliament. We have log books from when it was built until now and on 1953 29th of May the school was closed for three days in celbration of the coronation of her Majesty Elizabeth the 11 in 1953.The Wales in Bloom contest we won in the years 1976, 1977, 1978. We have three acres in which is an orchard,school, playground and a large playing field.
